title: Aaron and  Robin Gold
description:
Aaron Gold is a hilarious, knowledgable guy who has been writing about cars for decades, and loves the strange and eccentric automobile (or, vehicle, rather). He's been caring for the TST Million Mile Lexus, taking road trips with his wife, Robin, who joins us on this show.


This show is available as a video: https://youtu.be/q5aypc5s9nA


Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @theautonerd
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @aarontheautonerd

Check out our merch!
https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
